<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get form roles"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/formroles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all roles for the specified form.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"The file ID of the request.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved all roles for the form","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"roomId":{"type":"integer","description":"The room ID.","format":"int32","example":9846},"roleName":{"type":"string","description":"The role name.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"roleColor":{"type":"string","description":"The role color.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The user ID.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"sequence":{"type":"integer","description":"The role sequence.","format":"int32","example":1234},"submitted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the role was submitted or not.","example":true},"openedAt":{"type":"string","description":"The date and time when the role was opened.","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"submissionDate":{"type":"string","description":"The date and time when the role was submitted.","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The form role.","title":"FormRole"}},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"FormRoleArrayWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"You do not have enough permissions to view the form roles"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
